entry.summary: RT camiinthisthang.eth @ Amsterdam 🇳🇱 I’ll be judging at @activate_build, a multi chain hackathon taking place in Miami next month 🤠 I’m looking for orgs who want to sponsor a $10K travel fund for women/nb hackers to participate & compete for $100K+ in bounties. Please reach out if you’d like to support 🙏🏼

entry.title: RT Colin Forward: D_D members have exclusive access to a $15k travel fund for the @activate_build Miami Hackathon. Thanks to @C3protocol, members can ...
entry.summary: RT Colin Forward D_D members have exclusive access to a $15k travel fund for the @activate_build Miami Hackathon. Thanks to @C3protocol, members can apply for $$ assistance and build solutions on Algorand. There’s a prize pool of $50,000 + bounties. Apply here! https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfON26e8LOUeTI4lElgQnv52QtmuIxFJcY7z2WNXuiM451tDw/viewform

entry.title: RT Kui He: Don't forget today's koinos Talk. I host the show with fellow @developer_dao member @lukemwillis. Luke is a seasoned developer and a recent...
entry.summary: RT Kui He Don't forget today's koinos Talk. I host the show with fellow @developer_dao member @lukemwillis. Luke is a seasoned developer and a recent crypto convert while I've been using fee less blockchains and aping since 2017. You'll get both sides of the picture on why koinos. The Koinos Forum: Tomorrow, we're going to explain why we're all in on Koinos, in detail. We'll list why the bet is favorable and where there are going to be challenges along the ride. https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1OwxWzEEypAJQ

entry.title: RT Sam Williams 🐘: Truth. Consider @ArweaveTeam a protocol in need of DevRel 🙂.
entry.summary: RT Sam Williams 🐘 Truth. Consider @ArweaveTeam a protocol in need of DevRel 🙂. nader dabit (🧱, 🚀) | sha.eth | nader.sol: How to get hired in DevRel in web3 1. Find a protocol / team in need of DevRel 2. Learn tech then create a good example codebase with high quality learning material around it - workshop, tutorial, video 3. Apply for a grant, get paid for your work regardless 4. Share it 5. Apply

entry.title: RT with-heart: Hi! I'm the leader of the dev guild @developer_dao! For the entirety of my time in that role, I've felt that DAO leadership requires "X...
entry.summary: RT with-heart Hi! I'm the leader of the dev guild @developer_dao! For the entirety of my time in that role, I've felt that DAO leadership requires "X in public", where X is literally everything I've been too terrified of that to act on it. But not anymore So, some thoughts on leadership

entry.summary: RT Tableland We love the mission of @developer_dao and want to give @tableland__ creators a chance to join. Friday at 10:00 AM PST, we'll be giving away a free @developer_dao membership at our bi-weekly @tableland__ workshop. Learn, build, and then join D_D to learn and build some more! 1/2
